author: Shacob
title: The Wild Bunny
text:
Fort Frolic The Wild Bunny Transcript: The Wild Bunny by Sander Cohen: I want to take the ears off, but I can't. I hop, and when I hop, I never get off the ground. It's my curse, my eternal curse! I want to take the ears off but I can't! It's my curse! It's my fucking curse! I want to take the ears off! Please! Take them off! Please! 
Location : Sophia Salon , in the little room behind the counter, next to a plastered corpse. Behind the Scenes Edit This Audio Diary was written by creative director Ken Levine . [1] A real-world pullover hoodie inspired by Cohen's words in this Audio Diary was designed, available at the Irrational Games Online Store . The design was created by Zoe Brookes. [2] References
